name: pdf-generator-api
description: API for generating dynamic PDF documents.

scripts.deploy:prod: npm run synth && cd ./infra/cdk && cdk deploy --require-approval ${REQUIRE_APPROVAL:-broadening} --outputs-file ./cdk.output.json
scripts.destroy: export ENVIRONMENT_NAME=manual-deploy && export RETAIN_STATEFUL_RESOURCES=false && npm run synth && cd ./infra/cdk && cdk destroy
scripts.get-asset-by-lambda-name: echo 'Enter lambda name: \c' && read lambda_name && grep -rl "${lambda_name}/handler.ts" ./infra/cdk/cdk.out/*/index.js
scripts.infra:up: docker compose -f ./infra/local/docker-compose-app.yml up --wait -d && npm run init:db
scripts.invoke: npm run synth && sam local invoke -t ./infra/cdk/cdk.out/pdf-generator-api-local.template.json
scripts.start: npm run synth && sam local start-api -t ./infra/cdk/cdk.out/pdf-generator-api-local.template.json
scripts.start:debug: FORCE_STATIC_HASH=true concurrently --kill-others "npm run synth:watch" "npm run start -- -d 9229"
scripts.start:watch: FORCE_STATIC_HASH=true concurrently --kill-others "npm run synth:watch" "npm run start"
scripts.synth:watch: chokidar src/** package-lock.json config/values/local.config.json -c 'npm run synth'
scripts.test:it: npm run it-infra:up && jest --config ./.jest/jest.it.config.ts --runInBand && npm run it-infra:down
